Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: Game is really fun and different. I really enjoyed this experience. I don't really understand the hate. I think the people that are giving it bad reviews were expecting Resident Evil when it clearly wasn't even trying to be anything like that. It's about choices and it does for the most part\, make it feel like you are guiding players through a horror movie. Definitely worth two playthroughs
